_header: For a man that is almost blind
_description: ‘A good medycyn for sor eyen’ (a burlesque medical receipt) — two 6-line stanzas

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
for a man þat is almost blyndlat hym go barhed all day a gey
                    þe wynd…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…As well at mydnyȝt as at noneI schal lese my ryȝt
                    arme
